description: v2rayA is a V2Ray client supporting global transparent proxy(Linux Only), compatible with SS, SSR, Trojan(trojan-go), PingTunnel protocols.
notes: The database has been replaced with boltdb to try to solve the problem of database corruption. #267
Note that the data will not be migrated, but the previous data will be retained. If you need the previous data, just downgrade v2rayA (v1.5.4).
